title: Help - High Grade T206 Cards Vanish .....
author: Roulette44

posts.post_title: Help - High Grade T206 Cards Vanish .....
posts.post_content:
Hey guys - hope everyone is doing well.

There are four PSA 6-7  T206 cards from the last HA auction that I purchased.   Fedex says were delivered, but the cameras at the home show no one, and the signature that shows up on their system is ridiculous.

Anyways, will deal with the formal investigation and such, but also wanted to put a notice out here for the community, as i had been looking for these upgrades for my set for some time.

If you see any of these cards, would very much appreciate a heads up

T206 PSA 6 Sovereign George Bell PSA #016 338 092
T206 PSA 7 Sweet Cap Steve Evans PSA #905 450 60 
T206 PSA 6 Sovereign Jimmy Jackson PSA #153 204 16
T206 PSA 6 Sovereign Eddie Phelps PSA #231 939 25
Here are the images as well

Thanks to all!  Best regards, Joey
That sucks Joey. Good luck. Very nice cards that I hope make it to you. I believe we should bring back Public flogging & stockades.
Better file an insurance claim quickly because it could take forever to get your money back....

Appreciate the comments.   Kevin is right about how long insurance can take (I’m in that business), but I really hope the cards themselves are found.   A couple of those have evaded me for 2 years findings them in grade *sigh*.  If they were “five finger discounted”, I’m guessing their new owner could care less about their significance — which makes that thought even worse!!
